Boats.name: Ocean Breeze
Boats.description: A luxurious yacht equipped with modern amenities, including a hot tub, gourmet kitchen, and spacious lounging areas.

Boats.name: The Angler
Boats.description: A well-equipped fishing boat with all the necessary gear for a successful fishing trip. Includes sonar and multiple fishing rods.

Boats.name: Wind Whisperer
Boats.description: A sleek sailboat designed for both leisurely sailing and competitive racing. Features comfortable cabins and a state-of-the-art navigation system.

Boats.name: Lake Cruiser
Boats.description: A spacious pontoon boat perfect for relaxing on the lake. Comes with a sun deck, stereo system, and a small BBQ grill.

Trips.name: Sunset Cruise
Trips.description: Enjoy a relaxing evening cruise with breathtaking views of the sunset. Includes light refreshments and comfortable seating.

Trips.name: Deep Sea Fishing Expedition
Trips.description: Experience a thrilling day of deep sea fishing. Equipped with top-of-the-line fishing gear and professional guides.

Trips.name: Island Hopping Tour
Trips.description: Explore multiple beautiful islands in one day. Includes stops for swimming, snorkeling, and beachside picnics.

Trips.name: Romantic Dinner Cruise
Trips.description: An intimate dinner cruise featuring a gourmet meal and live music. Perfect for a special occasion or a romantic evening.

Additions.name: Fishing Gear Package
Additions.description: Includes high-quality fishing rods, reels, and tackle boxes. Ideal for serious anglers.

Additions.name: Luxury Sun Deck
Additions.description: A spacious sun deck with comfortable lounge chairs and a built-in cooler for drinks.

Additions.name: High-Resolution GPS System
Additions.description: Advanced GPS system with real-time navigation and detailed marine charts.

Additions.name: Underwater LED Lights
Additions.description: Bright LED lights installed underwater to enhance night-time visibility and create a stunning effect.

Additions.name: Portable BBQ Grill
Additions.description: Compact and easy-to-use BBQ grill for cooking meals while on the water.

Additions.name: Premium Sound System
Additions.description: High-quality audio system with Bluetooth connectivity and marine-grade speakers.

Additions.name: Climate Control Unit
Additions.description: Air conditioning and heating system to ensure comfort in all weather conditions.

Additions.name: Extended Bimini Top
Additions.description: A larger Bimini top providing extra shade and protection from the elements.

Admin: Log In: Access the admin dashboard.
View Pending Owner Accounts: Review all owner accounts that are awaiting approval.
Verify Owner Accounts: Approve or reject pending owner accounts.
View Pending Boats: Review all boats that are awaiting approval.
Verify Boat Listings: Approve or reject pending boat listings.
View Boat Reservations: Check all boat reservations, including those that are pending or confirmed.
View Canceled Boat Reservations: Review details of canceled boat reservations.
View Trips: Access information on all trips, including those that are active or confirmed.
View Canceled Trips: Review details of canceled trip reservations.
Owner: Register: Create a new owner account.
Log In: Access your owner account.
Add Boats: List new boats for your account.
View All Boats: Review a list of all boats associated with your account.
Delete Boat: Remove a boat from your account.
View Boat Reservations: Check all reservations made for your boats.
View Canceled Boat Reservations: Review details of canceled boat reservations.
Add Trips: Schedule new trips for your boats.
View Trip Reservations: Check all reservations for your trips.
View Canceled Trip Reservations: Review details of canceled trip reservations.
View Profile: Access and review your account profile.
Update Profile Information: Edit and update your profile details.
Add Balance to Wallet: Deposit funds into your account wallet.
Request Refund: Initiate a refund for canceled bookings or other eligible transactions.
Customer: Log In: Access your customer account.
Register: Create a new customer account.
View Available Boats: Browse all boats available for booking.
Book a Boat: Reserve a boat for your desired date and time.
View Boat Reservations: Check the status of all your boat reservations.
View Canceled Boat Reservations: Review details of canceled boat reservations.
Cancel Boat Reservation: Cancel a previously made boat reservation.
View Available Trips: Browse all trips available for booking.
Book a Trip: Reserve a trip that interests you.
View Canceled Trip Reservations: Review details of canceled trip reservations.
Cancel Trip Reservation: Cancel a previously made trip reservation.
View Profile: Access and review your customer profile.
Update Profile Information: Edit and update your profile details.
Add Balance: Deposit funds into your account balance.
